output: The 2024 season of Major League Cricket (MLC) is set to commence with two matches across the country on July 5th. The title sponsor for the 2024 edition is the professional services company Cognizant.
The player with the best batting strike rate is Dwaine Pretorius with a strike rate of 230.0.

Cricket Victoria and Cricket NSW are participating in Major League Cricket. They are acting as 'high-performance partners' for two of the teams, specifically the San Francisco Unicorns and the Washington Freedom.

Major League Cricket doesn't have a single owner, but rather a group of investors. Some of the prominent investors include Satya Nadella, the Chairman of Microsoft; Shantanu Narayen, the Chairman of Adobe; Vijay Shekhar Sharma, the Founder of Paytm; and the founders of Rocketship Venture Capital, Anand Rajaraman and Venky Harinarayan, among others. The cost to run the league is substantial, with about Â£100 million already pledged in spending for the league, and over half of this amount already invested.
The first match of MLC 2024 is scheduled to be played on July 5th at Church Street Park in Morrisville.
